Module org.tquadrat.foundation.config
Package org.tquadrat.foundation.config

Interface ConfigBeanBase

All Superinterfaces:
ConfigBeanSpec
All Known Subinterfaces:
CLIBean, PreferencesBean, SessionBean
@Deprecated(since="0.1.0", forRemoval=true) @ClassVersion(sourceVersion="$Id: ConfigBeanBase.java 884 2021-03-22 18:02:51Z tquadrat $") @API(status=DEPRECATED, since="0.0.1") public interface ConfigBeanBase extends ConfigBeanSpec
Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
Replaced by ConfigBeanSpec.
The base for the specification of a configuration bean; the final specification interface must also be annotated with @ConfigurationBeanSpecification in order to be recognised properly.

The generation process will only generate getter and setter methods, other methods must be provided as default.
If the configuration bean should be initialised through command line arguments, the specification interface must extend org.tquadrat.foundation.ui.cli.CLIBean, and if it should work with java.util.prefs.Preferences Preferences, the interface needs to extend org.tquadrat.foundation.ui.preferences.PreferencesBean. It could extend both.

To add the i18n feature, the configuration bean specification must also extend org.tquadrat.foundation.ui.i18n.I18nSupport.
Author:
Thomas Thrien (thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org)
Version:
$Id: ConfigBeanBase.java 884 2021-03-22 18:02:51Z tquadrat $
